formattedAddress: 301 South End Ave, New York, NY 10280, USA
adrFormatAddress: 301 South End Ave, New York, NY 10280-1002, USA

editorialSummary.text: Burgers, tacos & craft beer served in a hip tavern with a patio, pinball machines & board games.

originalText.text: I came here to spend time with some family and friends and I‚Äôm glad I did. The food came out quickly and tasted amazing. our server was awesome and the manager Jennifer  even came to us and asked how we were doing and how we were feeling. Jennifer  made us feel right at home.

originalText.text:
I absolutely love this place ! I work a few blocks away so my coworkers and I before heading to the train come in for happy hour drinks and good eats !

The trio sliders are so yummy ! Omg the brisket was tender and a lot of bbq. The pork and chicken juicy. We tried the truffle fries, the giant pretzel ( emphasis on giant üòÇ) and also the lobster ravioli omg üòç chef‚Äôs kiss !
The service so very attentive and welcoming. The manager made sure to pass by and check on us. We were seated at a bar table but didn‚Äôt feel left out like some places.
It‚Äôs a group of girls so of course we wanted all the fruity drinks ! the bartender ( Jenn or Jenny) did not hesitate once and created some delicious drinks, some off the menu and some
of her favorite personals ( her mojito and cosmos are one of the best I‚Äôve tried in a while) we played ping pong , jammed to music and headed home happy ! Definitely going to mention to my boss about hosting an event here ! Thank you !

originalText.text: Overall incredible experience, food was hot, ready, and tasty. It came out very fast and it was incredible. Also the place looks so nice and has a feel good vibe to the whole place making me want to talk and be with friends. Waiters were great and very helpful. It was great and there is nothing bad I could possibly say. Most definitely will be back

originalText.text: I have frequented Treadwell many times over the years as I have a close friend who lives nearby. This is one of the top notch, fun bars in the city. The food is always great and timely, and the atmosphere is fantastic whether you go to watch a game or enjoy the plethora of games that cater to your inner child (ping pong, pinball, arcade games, etc.). Last time I was there we sat at the bar and the service was excellent - I believe our bartender‚Äôs name was Jose (thanks, Jose!). Additionally, the service has been great from the other staff in my man times there. Excited to return again soon!

originalText.text: Every time is a good time in Treadwell downtown. The atmosphere is fun and warm. They have boardgames and ping pong. The free popcorn is a fun bonus. We played jenga and had cocktails. The food and the cocktails were delicious.
